oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wheat in the World - An interview with Nora Lapitan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Video
Interview
Cereals
Wheat
Interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. Nora Lapitan, Senior Scientist Advisor for the U.S.Agency for International Development, discusses the importance of wheat for global food security in her visit to CIMMYT headquarters.
